mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO at_service_cost ( FID, FType, FDate, FCardID, FCardName, FServiceTypeID, FServiceTypeName, FBuyStoreID, FBuyStoreNumber, FBuyStoreName, FConsumeStoreID, FConsumeStoreNumber, FConsumeStoreName, FMoney, FCrossStore, FGoodsStock, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, mark ) VALUES ( #{FID}, #{FType}, #{FDate}, #{FCardID}, #{FCardName}, #{FServiceTypeID}, #{FServiceTypeName}, #{FBuyStoreID}, #{FBuyStoreNumber}, #{FBuyStoreName}, #{FConsumeStoreID}, #{FConsumeStoreNumber}, #{FConsumeStoreName}, #{FMoney}, #{FCrossStore}, #{FGoodsStock}, #{FCreateBy}, #{FCreateDate}, #{FUpdateBy}, #{FUpdateDate}, #{mark} )

INSERT IGNORE INTO at_service_cost ( FID, FType, FDate, FCardID, FCardName, FServiceTypeID, FServiceTypeName, FBuyStoreID, FBuyStoreNumber, FBuyStoreName, FConsumeStoreID, FConsumeStoreNumber, FConsumeStoreName, FMoney, FCrossStore, FGoodsStock, FCreateBy, FCreateDate, FUpdateBy, FUpdateDate, mark ) VALUES
( #{item.FID}, #{item.FType}, #{item.FDate}, #{item.FCardID}, #{item.FCardName}, #{item.FServiceTypeID}, #{item.FServiceTypeName}, #{item.FBuyStoreID}, #{item.FBuyStoreNumber}, #{item.FBuyStoreName}, #{item.FConsumeStoreID}, #{item.FConsumeStoreNumber}, #{item.FConsumeStoreName}, #{item.FMoney}, #{item.FCrossStore}, #{item.FGoodsStock}, #{item.FCreateBy}, #{item.FCreateDate}, #{item.FUpdateBy}, #{item.FUpdateDate}, #{item.mark} )
